Key Match Events: South Africa lost 4 wickets for just 23 runs in the powerplay
Pre-Game Insights: None of the top batters have managed to perform well in the tournament so far
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram acknowledged the need to find form and credit Miller and Stubbs for getting them through in the last game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York pitch has been difficult for opening batters, leading players to focus on survival in the first 8-10 overs
